record.description: Youngsters at U. of C. Students enrolled at the University of Chicago after they have had two years of high school education get acquainted with the campus during their 8-day orientation period. Ready for a four-year program of general education are (left to right), Richard A. Freeman, 13, of 5009 Sheridan Road; Diane R. Darrow, 14, of 4515 S. Oakenwald Avenue; Charles Bidwell, 14, of 6858 Paxton Avenue; Barrie Seid, 14, of 7022 Constance Avenue; Calla Lurie, 14, of 5052 Drexel Blvd., and Dorothy Leiber, 14, of 5819 Blackstone Avenue.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
